last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 3
last_episode_to_air.overview: The Ramirez family finds out what actually happened the night Jorge Jr. was killed. Those who have also lost loved ones band together to fight for healing in their community.

name: Killing County
overview: In a big city with the soul of a small town in the depths of California, after a terrible shooting in a hotel makes the Ramirez family question everything they know about their city: Bakersfield.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: In Bakersfield, CA, two suspects die in an early morning shootout. But is there more to the story than meets the eye? In an unexpected twist for the Ramirez family, text messages reveal what their loved one was actually doing the night he was shot.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: A live TV interview reveals new information. A local cop goes from Hollywood hero to scandal. And two more troubling deaths. What emerges is that all have ties to the Ramirez case, as the family gets closer to the truth.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: The Ramirez family finds out what actually happened the night Jorge Jr. was killed. Those who have also lost loved ones band together to fight for healing in their community.
